results.title: Effects of simvastatin on oxidative stress in streptozotocin-induced diabetic rats: a role for glomeruli protection.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Increased @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ peroxidation and decreased antioxidant enzymes in plasma may play a role in the progression of @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may ameliorate these changes to protect kidney from @<m>DISEASE_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@oxidative lesion@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ even in the absence of @DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@lipid abnormalities@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhu B, Shen H, Zhou J, Lin F, Hu Y. Effects of simvastatin on oxidative stress in streptozotocin-induced diabetic rats: a role for glomeruli protection. Nephron Exp Nephrol. 2005;101(1):e1-8. PMID: 15886498

results.title: Effect of Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Lowering by Ezetimibe/Simvastatin on Outcome Incidence: Overview, Meta-Analyses, and Meta-Regression Analyses of Randomized Trials.
results.text_hl: Our meta-analysis provides evidence that, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with different @<m>DISEASE_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@CV disease@@@ burden, major CV events are safely reduced by LDL-C lowering with @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, while raising the hypothesis that the extent of LDL-C lowering might not be accompanied by incremental clinical-event reduction.

citations.NLM: Thomopoulos C, Skalis G, Michalopoulou H, Tsioufis C, Makris T. Effect of Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Lowering by Ezetimibe/Simvastatin on Outcome Incidence: Overview, Meta-Analyses, and Meta-Regression Analyses of Randomized Trials. Clin Cardiol. 2015 Dec;38(12):763-9. PMID: 26282344

results.title: Statin modulation of monocyte phenotype and function: implications for HIV-1-associated neurocognitive disorders.
results.text_hl: Treatment ex vivo with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ reduced the proportion of @GENE_FCGR3A @GENE_2214 @@@CD16@@@+ monocytes in peripheral blood mononuclear cells, as well as in purified monocytes, especially @GENE_CD14 @GENE_929 @@@CD14@@@++@GENE_FCGR3A @GENE_2214 @@@CD16@@@+ "intermediate" monocytes most closely associated with @<m>DISEASE_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004194 @@@neurocognitive disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Yadav A, Betts MR, Collman RG. Statin modulation of monocyte phenotype and function: implications for HIV-1-associated neurocognitive disorders. J Neurovirol. 2016 Oct;22(5):584-596. PMID: 27021071
